hero.title: Empowering Agriculture Through
hero.description1: Matrix Eagle is a blockchain powered platform connecting Global investors with real farming projects across Latin America, starting in Colombia.
hero.description2: We make agricultural investment simple, safe, and impactful, giving farmers fair access to funding and helping investors grow with purpose.
hero.description3: It’s not just about tech, it’s about trust, transparency, and real-world change.
hero.joinCall: Join the movement. Invest with impact. Grow with confidence.

Vision.ourMissionDesc: Our vision is to create a future where agricultural investment is easy, trusted, and open to everyone. We aim to use blockchain technology to remove barriers and build a new system where farmers, investors, and communities grow together. We want to lead the way in making agriculture more modern, transparent, and financially rewarding, not just in Colombia, but across Latin America and the world.
Vision.ourVisionDesc1: Our mission is to connect farmers with global investors through a secure and transparent blockchain platform. We are committed to giving farmers better access to funding, tools, and support so they can grow their businesses.
Vision.ourVisionDesc2: At the same time, we offer investors a way to earn income while making a real impact. By combining technology with real farming needs, we help both sides succeed and build stronger, more sustainable communities.

values.staking2: Profits generated by successful farming projects
values.security2: A stake in the long-term growth of the platform

tokenomics.title: TOKENOMICS
tokenomics.warningText: Please note that you should not send any tokens to this address, as doing so may result in the permanent loss of the tokens.
tokenomics.description: Tokenomics outlines the distribution and utility of our tokens, ensuring the long-term success and stability of the Etata project.

roadmap.title: ROAD MAP
roadmap.subtitle: The roadmap outlines our project milestones and future goals
roadmap.description: This roadmap provides a clear step-by-step plan for building and growing the project. It starts with setting up the foundation, platform design, team, and tokenomics and moves toward launching the presale, marketing, and farming partnerships. Each quarter focuses on real progress like launching staking, expanding features, and growing community reach. By following this timeline, Matrix Eagle can grow steadily and build trust with investors. It shows we have a clear vision and are ready to deliver.

q1.title: Q1 2025:
q1.point1: Build the platform design and tokenomics

q4.title: Q4 2025:
q4.point3: Begin outreach for global strategic partnerships

agriculture.problemIntro: Agriculture in Latin America, especially in Colombia, faces many ongoing problems:
agriculture.problem1: Most farmers do not have access to fair or reliable loans.
agriculture.problem2: They deal with unstable markets and low profit margins.
agriculture.problem3: There's a lack of trust and transparency in how agricultural investments are managed.
agriculture.solutionIntro: Matrix Eagle is a platform that combines blockchain technology and real agriculture to solve the problems above. We create a trusted and easy-to-use space where:
agriculture.solution1: Farmers can receive funding through smart contracts that protect both sides.
agriculture.solution2: Investors can safely support farming projects while earning profits.
agriculture.solution3: All transactions are traceable and secure using BEP-20 blockchain standards.
agriculture.solutionSummary: By creating this bridge between modern finance and traditional farming, Matrix Eagle brings real value to both worlds.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.question1: Is Matrix Eagle safe to use?
faq.answer1: Yes, Matrix Eagle is built on blockchain technology, ensuring transparency, security, and immutability for all transactions and records.
faq.answer2: You can invest by creating an account on our platform, completing the KYC process, and participating in the STO to purchase ETATA tokens.
faq.question3: What do I get from the STO?
faq.answer3: By participating in the Security Token Offering (STO), you receive ETATA tokens, which offer a share in company profits and long-term platform growth.
faq.answer4: Anyone who completes the registration and KYC verification process can join Matrix Eagle, subject to local regulations.

footer.disclaimer1: Disclaimer: Cryptocurrency may be unregulated in your jurisdiction.
footer.disclaimer2: The value of cryptocurrencies may fluctuate.
footer.disclaimer3: Profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes applicable in your jurisdiction.
